title: 加州橡树岭高中社会学实验课堂

action: Sit quietly at desk, observe classroom and teacher
thoughts: First day of this sociology experiment. I should pay close attention to the rules and follow instructions carefully to maintain good standing. The uniforms and flags make this feel very official.
memory: Arrived at sociology experiment classroom
Noticed strict classroom environment with flags and uniforms
Preparing to follow all rules carefully

action: Continue observing teacher's preparations while maintaining proper posture
thoughts: The teacher seems to be getting ready to start class. I should pay close attention and follow all instructions properly. The armband system looks important - I wonder who will get chosen to wear them. Better not whisper like the others did, that might break the rules.
memory: Observing teacher preparing lesson materials
Noticing other students whispering but choosing to remain quiet
Preparing to follow instructions carefully when class begins

action: Observe teacher's response to the question about armband selection process
thoughts: I need to pay close attention to how the teacher explains the armband selection. Understanding the rules completely will help me follow them properly and avoid losing points.
